评论概述: Very cute, but cheaply made- you get what you pay for!
评论详情: I bought a 10-pack of these glasses because I had purchased a single pair at a local shop that I loved. They felt well made and had a snug fit, so I wasn't always pushing them up. However, that pair broke. The frame and one lense cracked while I was shoveling snow. I looked on Amazon, and visually they appeared to be the EXACT same thing. But the glasses I received were definitely lower quality than the ones I purchased at the local shop. The frames look identical, but the hinges are a different style. The writing on the inside of one of the arms was different. For the price, these are not bad at all. But I was disappointed because I thought I had found the exact same glasses and these are not quite it. I will still wear these, and will probably give several pairs away to friends, but I might also go back to that shop and buy myself another pair of the higher quality glasses.
